name: ARK Natuurontwikkeling
goal: ARK wants to create real wild nature in Europe with room for all natural processes.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture
euInitiatives:
Establishing a formal status Wild for free roaming horses in Sbor area (Bulgaria) as an European example.
This with the help of the department of Animal health of DG SANCO.
